title: Weather-App
description: A weather built with Vite and React that fetches weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API and displays the current weather information for a searched city.

title: Registration Form
description: A registration form through users can register with their name, email, and password. If the same email is used to register again, an error message is shown.

title: Other Projects
